alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:12PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN KOOCHICHING AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 412 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nett Lake, or 34 miles south of International Falls, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nett Lake around 415 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Greaney and Bois Forte Band Nett Lake Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
